description: Apples are round fruits, typically red or green. They grow on trees.
Bananas are yellow fruits, with a distinctive shape. Typically peeled before eating.
Like a lemon, except smaller, greener, and more useful when making margaritas.

Small blue fruits - especially small if you live in Maine.
Spiky, rather scary fruits, pineapples are nevertheless popular and delicious.
